definitions.text: something reduced to its minimal form
examples: the battalion was a mere skeleton of its former self
the bare skeleton of a novel

definitions.text: a scandal that is kept secret
examples: there must be a skeleton somewhere in that family's closet

definitions.text: the hard structure (bones and cartilages) that provides a frame for the body of an animal
the internal supporting structure that gives an artifact its shape
examples: the building has a steel skeleton
